body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service team. My name is Andrew Rogers and I'm a customer service agent at ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Andrew, nice to meet you. My name is Diana Kelly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Diana. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, of course. My number is nine zero three - five five five - six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. Can you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Diana. We'll be able to assist you better with these details. Do you have any specific concerns or inquiries today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Actually, I'm feeling excited about purchasing a new car from your dealership and wanted to know more about your financing options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Diana. We have various financing options available to suit your needs. I'll provide you with more information on that. Thank you for considering ABC Car Dealership for your purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Diana. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Andrew. I appreciate your help. Have a great day too!
